page.title: Security Protocol
page.text: The $itemName is used to secure machines in Matter Overdrive. It can secure almost every usable machine. Once a machine is secured, it can only be destroyed or accessed by the owner and anybody else who has the access protocol.
To create a security protocol you have to get a blank one and click it while sneaking. This will cycle trough all the security protocol types.
$itemName (Access) - allows access to owned machines to anybody who has it in their inventory.
$itemName (Remove) - removes a claim to an owned machine. The machine must be own by the same person who created the protocol.
